Articles.Content:
Rick Grimes with his company climbs to the hill top and sees Hilltop.

No zombies, no survivors, as always.

Abandoned hill top.
Abandoned hilltop gets taken over with an armored battalion. My hilltop.

Your batallion forgot to pack lemons and there are no citrics in sight. Your batallion dies of scurvy.

Abandoned hilltop once again

Lemons now grow on the twice abandoned hill top.

Lemon Hilltop

The Earl of Lemongrab sees his new kingdom in the Hill, and establishes his castle there.

The Lemon Kingdom of the Hill

A strange man with a mop singlehandedly wipes the Lemon Kingdom's army and displaces the Earl.

Lemons' hill.

The he invites his brothers.

Lemon Brothers' hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-12-14T15:58:21Z" title="12/14/2017 03:58  PM" data-short="6 yr">December 14, 2017</time> by kerbiloid**

Life itself comes along and takes all the lemons to distribute around the world.

Lemon Brother's Lemonless hill.

Ordnance Survey comes around to [put a cairn on top](https://youtu.be/VxBlyZAl5MQ) of the hill. Wait, that's higher now...

Cairn hill.

A random spaceship fleet came across the hill, saw the cairn, decides to set up a research camp to study the cairn to see if it’s an alien relic.

A hill with a research camp on it.

Armageddon.

no ones hill.

A Vault-Tek experimental vault survives.

Postapocaliptic hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-12-17T09:50:23Z" title="12/17/2017 09:50  AM" data-short="6 yr">December 17, 2017</time> by kerbiloid**

The fleet decides to deploy asteroid defense system in orbit, and resettle the hill.

Barren, cratered hill with a research camp on it.

The Armageddon asteroid had xenomorph facehuggers that were found by a Vault tech citizen and a research center scientist. They are brought to their respective homes, and make a pair of Aliens that kill every human and animal. Then they lay their facehuggers and die, making plants make spores that have the same effect as a facehugger. The fleet quarantines the Hill.

No one’s hill.

A dog comes to the hill and marks it.

Dog's Hill.

The fleet decides to use antimatter to eradicate all lifeforms for safety. The hill was blasted to smithereens, then was rebuilt.

A new sandy hill
Your sand is turned to glass, and you are trapped underneath. My glass hill.
I hoist the glass hill on a classy foundation and freeze it. My cracked snow globe! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

I shatter the dome and build a perfect semi-sphere hill.

My hill.

It was incorrect half of the sphere.

Counter-your hill.
I smash your glass, and I build a concrete hemispherical bunker
Meet a DR. Device. Bye world

Dr. de Vice builds a lab on the top.

The hill of ~~Evil Scientific Maniac~~ Passionate Cold Mind.

Meet another DR. Device. AND Ender sets it off. Bye hill. Bye world. Bye kings. Bye arguments.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-12-19T22:11:46Z" title="12/19/2017 10:11  PM" data-short="6 yr">December 19, 2017</time> by KerBlitz Kerman**

A small hill grows from the ticket stubs.  

Cinema's hill.
